short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your browsing experience with AtmosTab, designed to bring the essentials of time and weather straight to your fingertips.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the 'AtmosTab' extension and setting the New Tab to that provided by Microsoft Bing, Terms of Use (https://www.atmostab.com/terms.html) and Privacy Policy (https://www.atmostab.com/privacy.html).

AtmosTab simplifies your browsing by providing instant access to YouTube, Gmail, WhatsApp and others.

The AI shortcut to ChatGPT and Bard provides immediate access to its conversational prowess, streamlining interactions for quick and efficient communication. This feature enhances user experience by simplifying the journey to leverage AI for information, creativity, problem-solving and more.

Transform your new tab page into a hub of elegance and functionality with AtmosTab, the ultimate Chrome extension for staying informed and inspired. Every time you open a new tab, AtmosTab greets you with a beautifully designed interface showcasing the current time and weather, tailored to your location.

Key Features:

- Local Weather Updates: Instantly view the temperature, weather conditions directly on your new tab page. Whether it's sunny skies or a rainy day, AtmosTab keeps you prepared.

- Elegant Clock Display: Keep track of time with AtmosTab's sophisticated clock, seamlessly integrated into your new tab. Choose from different colors.

- Customizable Backgrounds Colors: Personalize your new tab with a selection of stunning different colors, adding a touch of beauty to your daily browsing experience.

- Quick Access Links: Customize your new tab with links to your most-visited websites and essential tools, making your online navigation faster and more efficient.

- Location-Aware Settings: AtmosTab automatically detects your location to provide accurate weather conditions and time.

- Minimalist Design: Designed with simplicity and elegance in mind, AtmosTab's interface enhances your browsing experience without overwhelming you with unnecessary information.

Whether you're planning your day, needing a quick weather check, or just want to see the time at a glance, AtmosTab is your go-to solution for a more productive and visually appealing new tab experience.

Embrace the convenience of having the weather and time at your fingertips with AtmosTab, the perfect addition to your Chrome browsing experience.

Privacy Policy: https://www.atmostab.com/privacy.html
Terms of Use: https://www.atmostab.com/terms.html
Contact: https://www.atmostab.com/contact.html
